context: Have you seen The Lego Movie?

Oh, I saw Talladega Nights, and I loved that too. Adam McKay wrote The Other Guys. That is a good movie too
entity: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
resp: You seem to enjoy comedies! I agree that The Other Guys is good as well.
